spec_data.Name: gstreamer-plugins-espeak
spec_data.Description:
A simple gstreamer plugin to use espeak as a sound source.
It was developed to simplify the espeak usage in the Sugar Speak activity.
The plugin uses given text to produce audio output.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 09:19:06 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A simple gstreamer plugin to use espeak
